title: How to Update Rosters on NBA 2K13

steps.headline: Verify that your Xbox or Playstation gaming system is connected to the Internet.
steps.description: An Internet connection is required to download the latest rosters.

steps.headline: Power on your gaming console and wait for NBA 2K13 to load and display on-screen.
Select the option to access the game’s main menu.
Select “Download.” A list of all available rosters will display on-screen.
Select the first roster in the list, and verify that the title reads, “#Official#.” The list of rosters is sorted so that the latest roster is displayed at the top of the list.
Verify that the roster’s upload date is newer than the date of your existing roster.
Select the newest roster, then select “Download it” to confirm you want the roster downloaded to your console.
Wait for the roster to download to your gaming console.
steps.description: The process will take up to several seconds to complete.

steps.headline: Select “OK” when the download is complete.
Type a new name for the roster, if desired.
Select “OK” when NBA 2K13 informs you that the roster has been successfully saved to the hard drive of your gaming console.
steps.description: Your game will now be updated with the latest NBA roster information.

text: Verify that your Xbox or Playstation gaming system is connected to the Internet. An Internet connection is required to download the latest rosters. Power on your gaming console and wait for NBA 2K13 to load and display on-screen.  Select the option to access the game’s main menu.  Scroll to and select “Features.”  Scroll to and select 2K Share.”  Select “Download.” A list of all available rosters will display on-screen.  Select the first roster in the list, and verify that the title reads, “#Official#.” The list of rosters is sorted so that the latest roster is displayed at the top of the list.  Verify that the roster’s upload date is newer than the date of your existing roster.  Select the newest roster, then select “Download it” to confirm you want the roster downloaded to your console.  Wait for the roster to download to your gaming console. The process will take up to several seconds to complete. Select “OK” when the download is complete.  Type a new name for the roster, if desired.  Select “OK” when NBA 2K13 informs you that the roster has been successfully saved to the hard drive of your gaming console. Your game will now be updated with the latest NBA roster information.
